name: My beautiful deep twisted pocket
description:
This game is made as a submission to Ludum Dare 48 game jam. 

What is it?
My beautiful deep twisted pocket is a game about reaching into your pocket for something trivial and finding yourself on a journey through miles and miles of rubbish!

Featuring:

  • Playing rock-paper-scissors with apples
  • Dealing with a rhythm your pocket lives by
  • Meeting bones and spiders
  • And sometimes, gettig out of that pocket

Controls

A / Left - Rock

W / Up - Paper

D / Right - Scissors

Esc - Pause

NOTE

Blue obstacles are destroyed with a rock

Purple obstacles are destroyed with paper

Red obstacles are destroyed with scissors

This game currently has no ending, levels will keep generating as you go.
